sentences.en: Caulk a pipe joint; caulked the cracks between the boards with mud.
sentences.cn: 堵住水管接头的缝隙; 用泥堵住木板之间的裂缝.

sentences.en: Caulk or grouting needed in tub area.
sentences.cn: 需要为汽缸做灌浆或防漏.

sentences.en: Fibermax caulk is also used as a patchingmaterial around deteriorating burner blocks.
sentences.cn: Fibermax填缝材料还可用作维修炉体时的修补材料.

sentences.en: Plumbers caulk joints in pipe with lead, string or a caulking compound.
sentences.cn: 管子工用铅 、 绳子或专用填隙材料使管子的接头不漏水.

sentences.en: Shipbuilders caulk wooden boats with oakum and tar.
sentences.cn: 造船工匠用麻丝和沥青填塞木船缝隙,使之不渗水.

sentences.en: The sailors couldn't find anything to caulk the seam in the boat.
sentences.cn: 水手们找不到任何东西来填塞船上的裂缝.

trans.tran_en: to fill the holes or cracks in a ship with an oily or sticky substance in order to keep water out

trans.tran_cn: 堵（船的）缝，泥…的缝，填塞，使不漏水
